author: vmassol
msg: Fixed little error introduced during previous commits. Only display a "Fixes [...]" text if there's an issue attribute defined.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch

author: vmassol
msg: - Fixed bug apparently due to some changes in maven core. ${plugin} seems to now reference the calling plugin and not this plugin.
